plot: A hit-man (Robert) is convinced to take one more job before he goes into retirement. Little does he know that this hit will be his greatest challenge yet. Either way, this will be his last job.
title: The Favor
plot_es: A hit-man (Robert) is convinced to take one more job before he goes into retirement. Little does he know that this hit will be his greatest challenge yet. Either way, this will be his last job.
plot_en: A hit-man (Robert) is convinced to take one more job before he goes into retirement. Little does he know that this hit will be his greatest challenge yet. Either way, this will be his last job.
